(Spend 22 MC and 1 titanium to place a c: (Spend 22 MC and 1 titanium to place a colony on the moon and raise your MC production 1 step.)
(Spend 20 MC and 1 titanium to place a m: (Spend 20 MC and 1 titanium to place a mine on the moon and raise steel production 1 step.)
(Spend 18 MC and 1 steel to place a road: (Spend 18 MC and 1 steel to place a road on the moon and raise the Logistics Rate 1 step.)
